text: Pizzas are great. Service is pretty decent. The manager is great at resolving issues. The online ordering service is awful and I'll never use it again. Use it at your own risk, decent chance it'll cause you a big headache and/or more money than you initially wished to spend.

text: The pizzas are always good here and I like that I can bring them home and bake when ready to eat.  But the salad was lousy at best tonight.    I had to throw away more of it than we ate.   Was slimy and wilted.  And hardly any lettuce to begin with.   Not enough to make 2 small salads with?
